subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Accelerators: Cash, Coaching, and Connections
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Accelerators: Cash, Coaching, and Connections.

hook.text: Y Combinator invested $150K in Airbnb. That batch of startups is now worth over $300 billion combined.

buildup.text: Accelerators offer seed money, mentorship, and a network in exchange for 5-10% equity.

discovery.text: The real value isn't the money. It's the alumni network, the demo day exposure, and the brand.

twist.text: Not all accelerators are equal. Many take equity but add little value. Check alumni outcomes first.

punchline.text: A great accelerator compresses years of learning into months.
